title: The TRUTH About Fantasy TEs + Reaper Returns - Fantasy Football Podcast for 2/8
description:
It’s Super Bowl Week!! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, get a fantasy deep dive on the TE position. Who will be overdrafted in 2022? What did we learn from Kyle Pitts’ rookie season? Plus, the latest NFL News & more! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for February 8th, 2022.
(09:55) - NFL News
(21:45) - The TRUTH About Fantasy TEs
(22:25) - Mark Andrews
(29:15) - Travis Kelce
(34:20) - Dalton Schultz
(39:20) - George Kittle
(43:10) - Rob Gronkowski
(44:20) - Zach Ertz
(46:15) - Kyle Pitts
(50:35) - Dawson Knox
(53:45) - Hunter Henry
(56:15) - Dallas Goedert
(57:45) - T.J. Hockenson
(01:01:00) - Darren Waller
